children.text: The roof & floor beams have not all been tied or bolted to the post supporting them.
It is a requirement of Australian Standard AS 1684 Residential Timber-Framed Construction, clause 9.5 Nominal Fixings (Minimum Fixings), that
‘Verandah beams and roof beams shall be joined to posts with 1/M12 or 2/M10 bolts’
‘Posts shall be joined to bearers or joists with 1/M12 or 2/M10 bolts’ .
The fixing and tie-down detail of these beams, posts and joists must be properly rectified in compliance with the above.
